concept-wr.title: Virtual or Cloud Networks
concept-wr.shortdesc: In addition to the physical networks used to connect the Titanium Server hosts, Titanium Server uses virtual networks to support VMs.

conbody.p: Virtual networks, which include provider networks and tenant networks, are defined and implemented internally. They are connected to system hosts and to the outside world using physical networks attached to data interfaces on compute nodes.

Each physical network supports one or more provider networks, which may be implemented as a flat, VLAN, or VXLAN network. The provider networks in turn support tenant networks, which are allocated for use by different tenants and their VMs, and which can be isolated from one another.
